channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache NetBeans
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache NetBeans

item.title: CVE-2018-17191|2024-08-05T10:39:59.576Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20netbeans
item.description: Apache NetBeans (incubating) 9.0 NetBeans Proxy Auto-Configuration (PAC) interpretation is vulnerable for remote command execution (RCE). Using the nashorn script engine the environment of the javascript execution for the Proxy Auto-Configuration leaks privileged objects, that can be used to circumvent the execution limits. If a different script engine was used, no execution limits were in place. Both vectors allow remote code execution.
